alert.note: Alert for Coconino Plateau; Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 1:02AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will areas from Paulden through Ash Fork and Seligman through 200 AM MST... At 101 AM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles northwest of Paulden, or 17 miles northwest of Chino Valley, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Seligman, Ash Fork and Paulden. This includes the following highways... Business Interstate 40 between mile markers 140 and 146. Route 66 between mile markers 134 and 139. Interstate 40 between mile markers 117 and 146. State Route 89 between mile markers 334 and 341. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coconino Plateau; Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins
